quote: An attitude of positive expectation is the mark of the superior personality.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Gratitude is where every positive attitude starts.
author: Michael Hyatt,  Living Forward: A Proven Plan to Stop Drifting and Get the Life You Want

quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
author: Shiv Khera

quote: Elevate your inside game. A negative attitude is below the horizon...a place for lonesome hearts.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.
author: Matt Cameron

quote: When you think a positive thought, you become positive.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: I'm taking all the negatives in my life, and turning them into a positive.
author: Pitbull

quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: Better to be called something positive and inspirational than something negative.
author: Donnie Yen

quote: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
author: Walter Scott

quote: Be mindful. Be grateful. Be positive. Be true. Be kind.
author: Roy T. Bennett,  The Light in the Heart

quote: Our daily gratitude shapes our everyday attitude.
author: H.L. Balcomb

quote: The positive emotions that arise in...unpromising circumstances demonstrate that social ties and meaningful work are deeply desired, readily improvised, and intensely rewarding. The very structure of our economy and society prevent these goals from being achieved.
author: Rebecca Solnit

quote: Last weekend a young man asked me how I remain so positive. “It seems all the negativity in the world doesn’t affect you,” he said. I had no more than a minute with the young man so I offered this: It’s all about where you choose to put your attention, and I choose to be happy.
author: Jason Mraz

quote: Transform from being a fault-finder and blamer to a happiness-finder and appreciator. Positive emotions will increase in your life.
author: Maddy Malhotra,  How to Build Self-Esteem and Be Confident: Overcome Fears, Break Habits, Be Successful and Happy

quote: Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Commitment, belief and positive attitude are all important if you're going to be a success, whether you're in sports, in business or, as in my case, anthropology.
author: Donald Johanson

quote: Every negative...Has a positive side...
author: Nelson M. Lubao

quote: The same view you look at every day, the same life, can become something brand new by focusing on its gifts rather than the negative aspects. Perspective is your own choice and the best way to shift that perspective is through gratitude, by acknowledging and appreciating the positives.
author: Bronnie Ware,  The Top Five Regrets of the Dying: A Life Transformed by the Dearly Departing

quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: The First Splendid Truth: To be happy, I need to think about feeling good, feeling bad, and feeling right, in an atmosphere of growth.
author: Gretchen Rubin,  The Happiness Project: Or Why I Spent a Year Trying to Sing in the Morning, Clean My Closets, Fight Right, Read Aristotle, and Generally Have More Fun

quote: Morale and attitude are fundamentals to success.
author: Bud Wilkinson

quote: The secret ingredients to true happiness? Decisive optimism and personal responsibility.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Only positive thoughts can inspire you to positive actions.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We are constituted so that simple acts of kindness, such as giving to charity or expressing gratitude, have a positive effect on our long-term moods. The key to the happy life, it seems, is the good life: a life with sustained relationships, challenging work, and connections to community.
author: Paul Bloom

quote: Few things in the world are more powerful than a positive push. A smile. A world of optimism and hope. A 'you can do it' when things are tough.
author: Richard M. DeVos

quote: Positive thinking is the key to success in business, education, pro football, anything that you can mention. I go out there thinking that I'm going to complete every pass.
author: Ron Jaworski

quote: When we carry the thoughts of negativity and self-criticism, we inspire just what we don’t want: poor health and an unattractive physical body.
author: Dashama Konah Gordon,  Journey to Joyful: Transform Your Life with Pranashama Yoga

quote: Mix with positive-minded people as a means to tap into your unexploited potential.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: Some good can emerge from the most horrific of events. There is something positive hidden in every negative, and something negative in every positive. Life is complicated, and a balanced person can see both sides.
author: Amish Tripathi,  Scion of Ikshvaku

quote: Every negative...Jas a positive side...
author: Nelson M. Lubao

quote: One is happy as a result of one's own efforts once one knows the necessary ingredients of happiness: simple tastes, a certain degree of courage, self denial to a point, love of work, and above all, a clear conscience.
author: George Sand

quote: Beliefs that are good promote your potential and enhance your unique special qualities.
author: Deborah Day

quote: Affirmations are our mental vitamins, providing the supplementary positive thoughts we need to balance the barrage of negative events and thoughts we experience daily.
author: Tia Walker,  The Inspired Caregiver: Finding Joy While Caring for Those You Love

quote: The more you feed your mind with positive thoughts, the more you can attract great things into your life.
author: Roy T. Bennett,  The Light in the Heart

quote: Positivity is a connectivity between Heart-to-Heart and not Mind-to-Mind as that is only equal Profitability.
author: Anuj Somany

quote: If you are unclear about what attitudes you adhere to, you will have a difficult time evaluation which ones are not serving your highest good.
author: Deborah Day

quote: If you have positive energy you will always attract positive outcomes.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: Positivity is such a high predicator of success rates.
author: Shawn Achor

quote: But when nothing in your life happens in a positive frame, it is difficult to think positively and hope for the best.
author: Faraaz Kazi

quote: Anything you're good at contributes to happiness.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: With no positivity, there is no hope; with no negativity, there is no improvement.
author: Criss Jami,  Healology

quote: Saying thanks to the world, and acknowledging your own accomplishments, is a great way to feel good and stay positive.
author: Rachel Robins,  How To Feel Good About Yourself - Boost Your Confidence & Tackle Low Self Esteem. Packed with Self Improvement Techniques, Positive Thinking Tips & Inspirational Quotes

quote: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
author: Allen Klein

quote: I don't like any kind of negativity. I try to be good to everyone, whether it's a love, a friend, an ex. I'll always try to treat people the way I want to be treated.
author: Nina Dobrev

quote: The more you take responsibility for your attitudes, the more you can adjust yourself in a forward thinking manner.
author: Deborah Day

quote: Always try to be joyful and proactively benign to the people. By doing so everyday, people have no control at all over my mood.
author: Toba Beta,  Betelgeuse Incident: Insiden Bait Al-Jauza

quote: When you experience a negative circumstance or event, do not dwell on it. Be proactive — put your attention on what you need to do to bring the situation to a positive result.
author: Rodolfo Costa,  Advice My Parents Gave Me: and Other Lessons I Learned from My Mistakes
